services.title: AI Services
services.intro: INOSX builds practical, production-grade AI solutions that transform data, processes, and systems into measurable outcomes. Our portfolio blends automation, analytics, security, and multi-agent orchestration to drive efficiency, innovation, and competitiveness.

ai_agents.capability_4: Continuous learning and adaptation to business needs

security.title: INOSX CyberAI Security
security.capability_1: Continuous monitoring across systems and networks

knowledge.title: INOSX Knowledge Agents
knowledge.description: Document- and knowledge-centric agents for internal repositories.
knowledge.capability_1: Automatic indexing and reading of corporate documents
knowledge.capability_2: Contextual, semantic search over knowledge bases

orchestration.title: INOSX AI Orchestration

services.value_text: With INOSX solutions, your organization partners with AIâ€”not just uses it. Our products reduce costs, increase efficiency, democratize data access, protect digital assets, and orchestrate complex processes at scaleâ€”creating a faster, safer, and more competitive business.

surveyflow.hero_subtitle: Create intelligent surveys in seconds, analyze responses with AI, and get insights that actually drive decisions. No data science degree required.
surveyflow.feature1_desc: Describe what you want to learn, and AI generates a complete survey with optimized questions in seconds.
surveyflow.feature2_desc: AI automatically summarizes thousands of responses, identifies trends, and surfaces actionable insights.
surveyflow.feature3_desc: Target surveys based on user behavior, attributes, and journey stage. Get feedback at the perfect moment.
surveyflow.feature4_desc: Drag-and-drop editor with full brand control. Match your colors, fonts, and styleâ€”no design skills needed.
surveyflow.feature5_desc: Deploy surveys in 50+ languages simultaneously. AI translates and adapts questions for cultural context.
surveyflow.feature6_desc: Watch responses flow in live. Get instant notifications on critical feedback that needs immediate action.
surveyflow.step1_desc: Simply describe your research goal: "I want to understand why users abandon checkout" or "Measure customer satisfaction after support calls." AI does the rest.
surveyflow.step2_desc: Get a complete survey draft with research-backed questions, optimal question types, and smart skip logicâ€”ready to launch in seconds.
surveyflow.step3_desc: Target specific users based on behavior, trigger surveys at key moments, and personalize the experience. Maximize response rates.
surveyflow.step4_desc: AI analyzes every response, identifies patterns, and delivers clear recommendations. See what matters, skip the spreadsheets.
surveyflow.final_cta_title: Ready to Stop Guessing and Start Knowing?
surveyflow.final_cta_subtitle: Join 500+ companies using SurveyFlow to make data-driven decisions with confidence.
